challenges.title: Breaching the Siq Gate
challenges.description: The gate is locked with a legacy logic sequence. Reverse the 'stones' array to align the ancient mechanisms and clear the path.
challenges.bot_hint: Ancient builders often used mirror-logic. Try the .reverse() method.

challenges.title: The Roman Theatre Buffer
challenges.description: Synchronize the acoustic echoes using asynchronous parallel execution to unlock the amphitheater's hidden stage.
challenges.bot_hint: Parallel data streams require Promise.all for total synchronization.

challenges.title: Babylonian Encryption
challenges.description: The gate uses a closure-based Scope Lock. Extract the hidden key from the inner functional scope to bypass the Ishtar firewall.
challenges.bot_hint: Closures remember their lexical environment. Just return the secret.

challenges.title: Firewall Saturation
challenges.description: First stage of the BREAKER_MODULE. Trigger a recursive stack overflow to crash the entry-level sentinel.
challenges.bot_hint: A function calling itself without an exit is the ultimate weapon here.
